{"id":1030114809,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1Â month","timestamp":1692846865,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"2 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1030114809/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Replace All ?'s to Avoid Consecutive Repeating Characters","memory":"6.1 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    string modifyString(string s) {\n        for (auto i = 0; i < s.length(); i++) {\n            if (s[i] == '?') {\n                char c;\n                if (i > 0)\n                    c = s[i - 1] + 1;\n                if (!islower(c))\n                    c = 'a';\n                if (i < s.length() - 1)\n                    if (c == s[i + 1])\n                        c = s[i + 1] + 1;\n                if (!islower(c))\n                    c = 'a';\n                s[i] = c;\n            }\n        }\n        return s;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"replace-all-s-to-avoid-consecutive-repeating-characters","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
